line_2: Some stem the wave, some till the soil,

line_1: The vital Spirits answer to her Toil;
line_2: Washing her Temples with reviving Oil;

line_1: Nor was the Field ungrateful to his Toil:
line_2: My careful, loving Husband till'd the Soil,

line_1: To pass her tedious Hours in pleasing Toil:
line_2: HERE let us leave the lovely Nymph a-while,

line_1: Now reaps the Youth the Glory of his Toil;

line_1: And aye in this endearing pious toil

line_1: And aye in this endearing pious toil
